member.name: T:TeleScope.Logging.Extensions.ILoggerExtensions
member.summary: This extension class shortens log method calls.

member.name: M:TeleScope.Logging.Extensions.ILoggerExtensions.TraceMember(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger,System.String)
member.summary: Writes a trace message with the calling member.
member.param: The client-side message that contains the calling member name.

member.name: M:TeleScope.Logging.Extensions.ILoggerExtensions.Trace(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger,System.Exception,System.String,System.Object[])
member.param: The exception that will to be logged.

member.param: A data object whose string representation will be logged.

member.name: T:TeleScope.Logging.LoggingProvider
member.summary: The static class provides an easy-to-use API to inject the and to use provided loggers on client-side code.

member.name: M:TeleScope.Logging.LoggingProvider.Initialize(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILoggerFactory)
member.summary: Stores the given logger factory that provides loggers via the provided `CreateLogger` methods. If the parameter is null the is used internally.
member.param: The logger factory that will provide concrete loggers.

member.name: M:TeleScope.Logging.LoggingProvider.CreateLogger(System.String)
member.summary: Get a logger from the internal logger factory and use a name to tag the source.
member.param: The name tags the source of the log messages.

member.name: M:TeleScope.Logging.LoggingProvider.CreateLogger(System.Type)
member.summary: Get a logger from the internal logger factory and use a instance to tag the source.
member.param: The type tags the source of the log messages.

member.name: M:TeleScope.Logging.LoggingProvider.CreateLogger``1
member.summary: Get a logger from the internal logger factory and use a generic type to tag the source.
member.typeparam: The generic type T tags the source of the log messages.
